title: SoftBank’s Funds Post $27 Billion Loss on Plunging Tech Investments - The New York Times
content:
1. SoftBank’s Funds Post $27 Billion Loss on Plunging Tech Investments  The New York Times
  2. SoftBank Vision Fund posts record $27 billion loss as tech stocks plummet  CNBC
  3. SoftBank reports record $27.5 billion loss on crashing tech stocks  CNN
  4. SoftBank Reports $13 Billion Annual Loss, Hit by Tech-Share Slump  The Wall Street Journal
  5. SoftBank seen posting bruising Vision Fund loss on tech sell-off  Reuters.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Japanese conglomerate’s fortunes have sharply reversed from a record-setting result a year ago.
